resources.string: Name of Song - Name of Artist
This Activity is the home screen when you start this APP.
This Activity shows up all artists on user device, and sort alphabetically.
This Activity shows up all albums on user device, and sort alphabetically.
This Activity shows up all songs on user device, and sort alphabetically.
This Activity shows up user search result.
This Activity shows up payment information. User can choose a payment method, use credit card or use Paypal API.
When user click album information, will intent to payment activity.
